citation: Proclamation under the Water and Sewerage Industry Amendment Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Water and Sewerage Industry Amendment Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Water and Sewerage Industry Amendment Act 2012 fix 25 February 2013 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

4 February 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 13 February 2013

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
